member.name: M:PrintFramerAPI.Controllers.PriceFrameController.GetPrice(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the price of a frame based on its dimensions.
member.returns: The price, in dollars, of the picture frame.
member.response: Returns the cost of the frame in dollars.
If the amount of frame material needed is less than 20 inches or greater than 1000 inches.
